text: hwla' alyhwd hin dueuu 'iilaa al'iislam qalu: 'iina allah awsana fi altawrat 'alaa nsddiq man ja'ana yqwl: 'iinah rasul min allh, hataa yatina bisadaqat ytqrb biha 'iilaa allh, ftnzl nar min alsama' fthrqha. qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: 'antum kadhibun fi qwlkm; li'anah qad ja' aba'akum rsl min qibly balmejzat waldlayl ealaa sdqhm, wabialadhi qultum min al'ityan balqrban aldhy takuluh alnar, falim qatal abawukum hwla' al'anbia' 'iin kuntum sadiqin fi dewakm?
